name: The Shadows of Kara-Moon
description:
Follow your destiny along the path of the warrior:      

Two colossal armies wage war across the mysterious, ancient  ruins of Kara-moon.   The fight for the future of humanity begins as your battle leads you to the discovery of a sinister secret.

   

Kara-moon is a dark, dying world, were kingdoms rise and fall swiftly as the wind.     A land of steel and magic, fraught with danger and peril.   The bones and blood of many fallen warriors scatter these ravaged lands.

 

 Generation after generation whom have only known hardship and strife, fight and die in a seemingly endless conflict.

      In order to bring an end to this cataclysm ,   the high mages used science and magic to create a new type of superior warrior...

  

    Known as the "Divine Cerus",   these were creatures of incredible power and intelligence.    Although few in number they were able to turn the tide of any conflict.

      Now your fight begins, battle your way into the thousand year old ruins of the wastelands  and search for the horrifying truth.
